title: Senior Business Journalist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a sharp, detail-oriented Business Journalist to join our editorial team. In this role, you’ll be responsible for editing and rewriting business copy tailored to B2B audiences across a range of sectors. Your primary focus will be shaping content for email newsletters that deliver clear, concise, and engaging news and insights to industry decision-makers.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit and rewrite business news content for accuracy, clarity, and tone
- Tailor copy to fit the needs of different B2B sectors and professional audiences
- Maintain house style and editorial consistency across all newsletter formats
- Collaborate with various leads to refine story angles and structure
- Stay updated on industry trends to ensure the relevance and timeliness of content
- Work under tight deadlines while maintaining high editorial standards

About You:
- Proven experience in journalism, ideally with a B2B or trade publication focus
- Strong editing and rewriting skills with a keen eye for detail
- Able to distill complex business topics into digestible, engaging copy
- Comfortable working in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
- Knowledge of email newsletter formats and digital publishing best practices is a plus
